resources.string: M4a format is encoded with AAC audio codec has good quality and small size. (recommended) \nWav is uncompressed audio data format. It takes much more space than other formats. It\'s needed for specific cases. \n3gp is a multimedia container format developed for mobile telecommunication services. Use it if you need to save space.

Sample rate is the number of samples of audio carried per second. 
48kHz is the sample rate used for DVDs. 
44,1kHz is the sampling rate of Audio CDs. (recommended) 
22kHz popular sample rate for low bit rate such as 64 kbps. 
 8kHz sample rate has less bandwidth than modern telephone systems. Not suitable for any serious recording task.

Bitrate is size of data per second of sound. Directly affects recording quality and size. 
256 kbps good quality bitrate. 
192 kbps medium quality bitrate. 
128 kbps mid-range bitrate quality. Common bitrate for podcasts. (recommended) 
96 kbps generally used for speech or low-quality streaming. 
48 kbps generally acceptable only for speech.

Stereo two separate channels are recorded. This means that each stereo speaker has a different sound signal. (recommended) \nMono one signal channel is recorded. It can be reproduced through several speakers, but all speakers are still reproducing the same copy of the signal.
